token-tooltip-next.settings.SHOW_HINTS.h: Hide hints to make the settings more compact.
token-tooltip-next.settings.SHOW_ONLY_WH: Show tooltips only if the specified key is pressed. Leave empty to show tooltips all the time.
token-tooltip-next.settings.SHOW_AFTER_D: Show tooltips after you hover N ms over the token.
token-tooltip-next.settings.SHOW_ALL.hin: Show tooltips for all tokens while holding the <ALT> key.
token-tooltip-next.settings.SHOW_ALL_HID: Show tooltips for all hidden tokens
Show tooltips for all hidden tokens while holding the <ALT> key.
Pick the actor type for which you want to edit the tooltip.
token-tooltip-next.settings.DISPOSITIONS: Pick the actor disposition for which you want to edit the tooltip.
token-tooltip-next.settings.USE_GAMEMAST: Use the settings defined by the gamemaster.
Use the settings defined for the default actor type.
token-tooltip-next.settings.DARK_THEME.h: Use the dark transparent theme for the tooltips
This is an advanced feature, please don't change it if you don't know what you are doing. This will determine from where the tooltip data is pulled.
token-tooltip-next.settings.FONT_SIZE.hi: Customize the tooltip's font size between 1 and 2.5 rem.
token-tooltip-next.settings.USER_TYPES.h: Pick the user type for which you want to edit the tooltip.
